author: siladu
content:
Aynone else had trouble with withdrawals hive tests 3 and 4 since the latest spec changes? Think it's related to the change from `-38003: Invalid payload  -> -32602: Invalid Params` in engine_forkchoiceUpdatedV2

```
./hive -sim "ethereum/engine" --sim.limit "engine-withdrawals" -client besu_local-a7c96ca-arm -docker.nocache besu
...
INFO[01-17|19:33:41] API: test started                        suite=0 test=3 name="Withdrawals Fork on Block 2 (besu_local-a7c96ca-arm)"
INFO[01-17|19:33:44] API: client besu_local-a7c96ca-arm started suite=0 test=3 container=13478766
INFO[01-17|19:33:46] API: test ended                          suite=0 test=3 pass=false
INFO[01-17|19:33:46] API: test started                        suite=0 test=4 name="Withdrawals Fork on Block 3 (besu_local-a7c96ca-arm)"
INFO[01-17|19:33:49] API: client besu_local-a7c96ca-arm started suite=0 test=4 container=ff63f477
INFO[01-17|19:33:51] API: test ended                          suite=0 test=4 pass=false
```

author: marioevz
content:
Yes I made this update based on this spec change: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/shanghai.md#request
It expects 32602 because we are sending the withdrawals pre-shanghai, or null-withdrawals post-shanghai, both in newPayload and fcU

author: marioevz
content:
~~Ah wait, I made this change only on https://github.com/ethereum/hive/tree/engine-withdrawals-2, not on https://github.com/marioevz/hive/tree/engine-withdrawals-2 ~~<@341574016160497665>
Change is in both branches

author: siladu
content: Thanks. Yeh seems like we're sending 32602 correctly but tests 3 and 4 still consistently fail.
